title: WHO backs malaria vaccine rollout for Africa's children in major breakthrough
content:
1. WHO backs malaria vaccine rollout for Africa's children in major breakthrough  Reuters
  2. Malaria jab could save hundreds of thousands of lives a year  Sky News
  3. First Malaria Vaccine Approved by W.H.O.  The New York Times
  4. WHO: malaria vaccine will 'change the course of history'  Guardian News
  5. OMS yemeje ikoreshwa ry'urukingo rwa malaria muri Afrika  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: WHO、アフリカの子供たちへのマラリアワクチンの提供を決定
